result.purpose: Responsible for handling consumer check-in events and tracking metrics related to those events.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on specific functionalities related to consumer events and metrics tracking.

internal/domains/quest/consumers/metrics.purpose: Defines metrics for tracking consumer check-ins using Prometheus.

internal/domains/quest/consumers/roninch.purpose: Handles check-in events for Ronin contracts using Kafka consumer messages.
